You can filter pages by language.

There is the language element in the HTM=
L block.

example: <html lang=3D"jp">

There is the language meta-tag

<met=
a http-equiv=3D"Content-Language" content=3D"en-us">

Here is some HTML ref=
erences on the subject.

http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_standardattribut=
es.asp

Now, there isn't anything you can do if that don't define the langu=
age
in the HTML, but you can catch the Unicode characters of non-english
ch=
aracters, and filter on that.

Wiki on Unicoding

http://en.wikipedia.org/w=
iki/Character_encoding
